text: once upon a time
in a land far far away they lived a
beautiful and
warm-hearted girl one day when her
mother passed away
her father remarried another woman
this evil-hearted stepmother had two
daughters just as evil as herself
her stepmother and stepsisters treated
her very badly
you cannot sit with us on the same table
you cannot sit with us
oops the glass fell down hurry and clean
it up cinderella
while they were out and having fun she
had to stay home and do all the dirty
housework
[Music]
everybody at home used to call her
cinderella
when she got tired she sat down in front
of the fireplace
placed her cat on her lap and tried to
warm up with the dying fire
one fine morning they received an
invitation from the palace
a big ball is going to be held at the
palace
in honor of the prince and all the girls
eligible for marriage
are invited
while the stepmother was preparing her
daughters for the ball
cinderella was unwillingly helping them
you have to be the most beautiful girls
in the bowl
the prince must like you why can't i
come
all the girls eligible for marriage are
invited
really is this the outfit you're going
to wear to the ball
when the day for the ball had arrived
all alone
at home cinderella couldn't help her
tears
and started crying right at that moment
a bright light appeared in the chimney
through the bright light
appeared a beautiful film
cinderella could not believe her eyes
because this fairy was her mother
mother hello my darling i
came to help you you too will go to the
ball at the palace
really but how with my little help
now you go get me the biggest pumpkin
from the garden
and you kitty cat hurry up and fetch me
seven mice

she then turned her magic wand to the

now it's your turn i look like

i do not know how to dance what if the

you must have a dance with the prince oh

the magic will be gone by exactly
midnight

before the clock hits 12.
thank you very much mother i will come
before midnight
i promise mother
will i be able to see you again
[Music]
i'm always by your side
[Music]
when cinderella entered the palace with
her elegance and beauty
suddenly all the heads turned towards
her
even her stepsisters could not recognize
her and of course
the handsome prince was mesmerized by
her beauty
the king and the queen also were very

now that's what i call a princess
[Music]
prince immediately asked cinderella to

with their jealousy cinderella was so

she could not feel how fast time had

suddenly the clock on the wall caught
her eye
it was almost midnight
leaving the prince standing there she

and right when she was running one of

but there was not enough time to turn

[Music]
running after cinderella the prince

find the owner of the shoe as soon as

but find her the men
traveled around the country knocked on
every door
and allowed every young girl to try the

but the shoe did not fit anyone

until finally they arrived to
cinderella's house
both the stepsisters tried the shoe on
if you push a little further it will fit
yes yes my daughter's feet are a little
swollen because she's very tired
but the shoe did not fit either of them
the men said that their captain
had seen another girl inside the house
there's another young lady in the house
as soon as cinderella put on the shoe

just perfectly
you have to come to the palace with us

the princess men took cinderella to the

when the prince saw cinderella he

he went down on his knees and asked her

will you marry me my princess
immediately and with great pleasure

proposal

[Music]
but so how did it happen that my shoe

[Music]
i'm always by your side
[Music]
of course oh mother it was you
all that time
[Music]
once upon a time they left a king who
had 12
beautiful daughters
these 12 princesses lived all together
in a big
beautiful room the king protected his
daughters with his heart
and when they went to bed at night time
he did not allow them to go out
[Music]
but every morning they would wake up to
something
very strange
the shoes of the princesses would all be
worn out
as if they had danced all night long
the king had to buy his daughter's new
shoes
every day but the following days after
the shoes just kept wearing out
neither the king nor his men in the
castle could solve the mystery
of the shoes how is this even possible
how can a pair of shoes worn out like
that in just one night
your highness we can't understand
finally the king said
whoever solves the mystery of my
daughter's shoes
will get to marry whichever daughter of
mine he chooses
become my son-in-law and get to be the
king
when i pass away but he has three days
and three nights to solve it
otherwise he will spend his life in
prison
many young men in the kingdom and even
princes
from other kingdoms came to the castle
for the job
for days they guarded the door of the
twelve princesses

could solve the mystery
and shoes continued to wear out by the
night
finally a good-hearted young man also
wanted to give it a shot
and so he made his way to the castle
on his way he met a lanky old lady
who looked very poor my
dear child i'm very hungry would you be

the young man gave all the food he had
in his bag to the old lady
she was very happy because the previous
men
who had passed didn't give anything
the old woman knew that this one was
different
than the others so in return she gave
him
a magic cape take this magic cape
when you wear it you will be invisible
when it strikes 12 o'clock at night
put the cape on be invisible and get in

this way you can solve the mystery of
the shoes
but be aware do not drink what the
princesses give you
no those nasty princesses
the young man took the magic cape and
went to the castle

and when he arrived he said that he was

first day when he was keeping guard in

you must be thirsty we have prepared

please have some the young man forgot

soon after he was very sleepy
he fell asleep snoring all

[Music]
when it was morning the young man

on the second night the young man once

in front of the princess's room
this time another princess came out with

the young man was so thirsty while
keeping god and waiting for the

without thinking he drank all the juice

and of course dozed off once again
the next morning when he woke up he

but be aware do not drink what the

there must be a sleeping pill in the

at that moment the king came next to him
two days have gone by and you still

if you cannot do it today you will end

for the rest of your life the king
finished his talk
and went away the young man had to solve

that night for the last time the young

princess's door
this time the youngest princess came out

this time round he was standing tall
the night fell and soon it was midnight

cape on and that that moment became

slowly he opened the door and could not

all of the princesses were wearing their

hair and makeup done with their very new

oh somebody stepped on my skirt oh

when the stairs had finished they came

they went past tall trees with beautiful

there were 12 boats in the shape of

there were 12 princes waiting for the

they got on the boats and the young man

the boat seems heavier than usual today
as if another person is on it
strange oh come on stop dreaming
when they crossed the river they came

when he looked through the window the

they would never get tired and just kept

of course their shoes started to wear

the young man could not bear his hunger

hey my cake my cake is floating as if

invisible is eating it come on stop it
with this

the princesses danced till the morning

walk through the forest walked up the

the twelve dancing princesses were

after once upon a time
there lived a very rich man he had three
daughters
two of them were really greedy and
self-centered girls
but the third one had a heart full of
love and kindness
one day their dad received the news that
his ships had sunk
due to the storm poor man had lost
everything and was left with only his
little house in the village
the two greedy sisters were of course
not pleased with this situation
all day long all they were doing was
sitting around and complaining
all the housework was left to beauty
after a while their father heard that
one of his lost ships
had made it to the harbour he started to
prepare to go to the harbour right away
and before he left he asked his
daughters
what should i bring you when i get back
girls dress
shoes necklace and bracelets
and what about you beauty what do you
want
just the rosie's fine daddy
their father arrived at the harbour
after a long journey
but neither his stuff on the boat was
there nor was the ship
usable sad and tired he started his
journey back home
it was almost dark when he reached the
forest
the forest was dark and cold and it was
snowing
he rode his horse for hours and hours

and finally he saw a castle with the

he entered hoping maybe they might help

it was a weird castle the lights were on
everywhere the dinner table was full of

and there was fire in the chimney but

he called out for someone but no one
answered
finally not being able to wait anymore
he first ate some food from the table

when he woke up in the morning he found
some new clothes
next to the bed
he went downstairs
a nice breakfast was waiting for him on

this castle should belong to a fairy or
she wouldn't help me like this
i wish i could thank her
when he was leaving the castle he
noticed
the rose garden i could not grant my
other daughter's wishes
at least i can make beauty's wish happen
he thought
to himself
just as he picked a rose
he and his surroundings shook with a

the father almost fainted when he saw

would you let me watch you beauty
you own the place why would you ask me
no you own this castle now if you want
i can live immediately beauty

i want to ask you something do you think
i'm really ugly

well would you marry me then this time

couple months passed beauty was no
